author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the ParticleNet tagger to NanoAOD. The following scores will be included in NanoAOD:

- ParticleNet: `TvsQCD`, `WvsQCD`, `ZvsQCD`, `HbbvsQCD`, `HccvsQCD`, `H4qvsQCD`, `QCD`
- ParticleNet-MD: `Xbb`, `Xcc`, `Xqq`, `QCD`

The ParticleNet tagger needs to run in the NanoAOD sequence until we have the tagger stored in MiniAOD. The updated training [[V01](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31036)] should be used for both UL and EOY samples.

FYI @camclean @alefisico
title: Add ParticleNet to NanoAOD
